description: Elevate burger night with these flavoursome and herby pork and apple burgers with a quick slaw.
name: Pork, Apple & Sage Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium apple, peeled, cored and grated, divided

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Mix the pork mince, sage and half of the grated apple in a large bowl. Form into 4 thick patties with your hands.
Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan and cook the burgers for 2-3 minutes on each side to brown. Place on a baking tray and bake for 5 minutes.
Whisk the apple cider vinegar and mustard into the yoghurt and mix in the rest of the apple, carrot and red cabbage to make a slaw.
Serve the burgers on toasted wholemeal rolls topped with slaw.
